@package tfl-app
@version 0.1.0.0

module Types

-- | User data type representing a user from JSONPlaceholder API
data User
User :: Int -> Text -> Text -> User
[id] :: User -> Int
[name] :: User -> Text
[email] :: User -> Text
instance GHC.Internal.Generics.Generic Types.User
instance GHC.Internal.Show.Show Types.User

module Fetch
fetchUser :: Int -> IO (Maybe User)
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Types.User
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Types.User

module Databases

-- | User data type representing a user from JSONPlaceholder API
data User
User :: Int -> Text -> Text -> User
[id] :: User -> Int
[name] :: User -> Text
[email] :: User -> Text

-- | Inserts a user into the database
insertUser :: Connection -> User -> IO ()

-- | Retrieves all users from the database
getAllUsers :: Connection -> IO [User]

-- | Deletes all users from the database
deleteAllUsers :: Connection -> IO ()

-- | Main database application
database :: IO ()

-- | Initializes the database
initDB :: Connection -> IO ()
instance Database.SQLite.Simple.FromRow.FromRow Types.User
instance Database.SQLite.Simple.ToRow.ToRow Types.User

module Main

-- | Main application
main :: IO ()
